meanings.sent1: The rock was insentient, showing no signs of awareness.
meanings.sent2: The insentient robot moved mechanically, without any consciousness.
meanings.sent3: The insentient alarm clock failed to wake me up this morning.
meanings.sent4: The insentient walls of the room seemed to close in on me.
meanings.sent5: The insentient computer screen stared back blankly, devoid of any understanding.

meanings.definition: Not capable of feeling or sensation
meanings.sent1: The insentient doll remained unmoved by the child's hugs.
meanings.sent2: The insentient stone felt cold and unyielding to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The insentient pillow didn't mind being squished all day.
meanings.sent4: The insentient wind whispered through the trees, unnoticed by all.
meanings.sent5: The insentient metal door offered no resistance to the intruders.

meanings.sent1: The insentient landscape stretched out before us, barren and lifeless.
meanings.sent2: The insentient painting on the wall seemed to lack any vitality.
meanings.sent3: The insentient flower pot never bloomed, much to the gardener's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The insentient night sky sparkled with distant stars, cold and unfeeling.
meanings.sent5: The insentient old house creaked with the weight of its own emptiness.
